body_html:
RE: indentation: diff isn't showing white-space only changes. I changed the generated methods to two-space indent to match the rest of C++ including the non-generated parts of VariableType.cpp.

(See the full VariableType.cpp linked above to verify)

body:
RE: indentation: `diff` isn't showing white-space only changes. I changed the generated methods to two-space indent to match the rest of C++ including the non-generated parts of VariableType.cpp.

(See the full VariableType.cpp linked above to verify)
